doc.title: Fall of the Roman Empire
doc.plot: Incarcerated for fifteen years, Frank is finally released, but his world has changed! No longer his deposed old boss Marco's 'right-hand man', he is forgotten and destitute! His dream for a peaceful life becomes a nightmare when old friends are murdered! He must once-again rise through the ranks, somehow make his fortune and take his revenge against the Russian Mafia now running his manor! This is a stylish and gritty British thriller, set in a world so depraved, that even villains can be heroes... East meets West... in this clash of the gangsters!
